name: jasmine-spec-reporter
description: Spec reporter for jasmine behavior-driven development framework

scripts.test:integration: npm run pretest && npm run examples:update && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine-integration.json
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json --type-check --project tsconfig.json && tslint -c tslint.json --type-check --project spec/tsconfig.json
scripts.examples:update: npm run examples:update:node && npm run examples:update:protractor && npm run examples:update:typescript
scripts.examples:update:node: cd examples/node && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.examples:update:protractor: cd examples/protractor && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.examples:update:typescript: cd examples/typescript && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.coverage:codecov: npm run coverage && nyc report --reporter=json && codecov -f coverage/*.json

author: Bastien Caudan
